Posts.Content: Jul 31, 2009 01:48PM Dianna66 wrote: In June, I had a double mastectomy with immediate placement of tissue expanders. I am now recieving DD ACT. My first Tx was 7/22. Thankfully, so far all has gone well. I only had about 24 hrs of nausea on the Saturday after my first Tx. No hair loss yet, but am going tonight after work to get it cut real short anyway.  I'm not one to usually post on discussion boards, but I've found that having others to talk to who are experiencing the same thing is comforting.
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo in July 2009 PauldingMom jacee
